name: Repair
description: You touch an object that has been damaged, such as something that has been broken into no more than 4 pieces, ripped or cracked and magically repair it.
charge: An object that is missing parts or pieces can be repaired if you have 80% or more of the original object. This spell will fail if the value of the missing pieces exceeds the value of the object in it's current state.
components: a scrap of material of the same type as the target object
